elements.text: Ujjivan Bank also assists during other crucial events

text: Open a Joint Account for hassle free transactions
Add your spouse as the Nominee to your accounts
Open a Minor Account and provide financial security
Easy conversion of Minor Account to regular Account
Facility of Anywhere Banking, no additional charges at any Ujjivan Bank Branch
Easy transfer of account in times of need

elements.text: Life Events Based Banking Services is a program designed to add value to the lives of our beloved elders.

text: Single point of contact for all the Life Events Based Banking Services
Guidance in handling banking transactions during major _life events
A helping hand when you might need it the most
